SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.endpoints

Class ApiEndpoint

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.endpoints.HttpEndpoint
com.mimecast.robin.endpoints.ApiEndpoint
public class ApiEndpoint extends HttpEndpoint
API endpoint for case submission and queue management.

Starts a lightweight HTTP server to accept JSON/JSON5 case definitions (either as raw JSON in the body or by providing a file path) and executes the client.

Endpoint:

  • GET / — Serves a simple HTML landing page documenting available API endpoints.
  • POST /client/send — Accepts either a JSON/JSON5 payload describing a case or a query parameter path that points to a case file on disk. It executes the SMTP client with the supplied case and responds with the final Session serialized as JSON.
  • POST /client/queue — Same inputs as /client/send, but instead of sending immediately, it enqueues the built Session as a RelaySession into the persistent relay queue.
  • GET /client/queue/list — Lists the current relay queue contents in a simple HTML table.
  • GET /logs — Searches log files for lines matching a query string. Supports text/plain GET requests only. Returns usage message if no query parameter is set. Searches current and previous log4j2 log files.
  • GET /store[/...] — Browse local message storage. Directory listings are returned as HTML with clickable links; individual .eml files are returned as text/plain. Empty folders are ignored.
  • GET /health — Simple liveness endpoint returning HTTP 200 with {"status":"UP"}.

Response serialization excludes heavy or sensitive fields to keep payloads compact and safe:

  • magic map
  • savedResults map
  • stream and internal bytes backing

      Starts the API endpoint with endpoint configuration.
      Specified by:
      start in class HttpEndpoint
      Parameters:
      config - EndpointConfig containing port and authentication settings (authType, authValue, allowList).
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during server startup.

    • handleLandingPage

      private void handleLandingPage(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Serves a simple HTML landing page that documents available API endpoints.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • handleClientSend

      private void handleClientSend(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Handles POST /client/send requests.

      Supports raw JSON/JSON5 describing the case — parsed and executed in-memory.

      On success, returns the final Session as filtered JSON. On failure, returns HTTP 4xx/5xx with an explanatory message.

      Throws:
      IOException

    • handleClientQueue

      private void handleClientQueue(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Handles POST /client/queue requests.

      Supports raw JSON/JSON5 describing the case — parsed and mapped in-memory.

      On success, enqueues a RelaySession for later delivery and returns a JSON confirmation with the filtered Session plus queue size.

      Throws:
      IOException

    • handleQueueList

      private void handleQueueList(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Lists the relay queue contents in a simple HTML table. Supports pagination via query parameters: page (1-based) and limit (default 50).
      Throws:
      IOException

    • checkMethodAndAuth

      boolean checkMethodAndAuth(HttpExchange exchange, String expectedMethod) throws IOException
      Checks if the request method matches expected and if the exchange is authenticated. Sends appropriate error responses if checks fail.
      Parameters:
      exchange - HTTP exchange.
      expectedMethod - Expected HTTP method (e.g., "POST", "GET").
      Returns:
      true if method and auth check pass, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • handleLogs

      private void handleLogs(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Handles GET /logs requests.

      Searches current and previous log4j2 log files for lines matching a query string.

      Supports only GET requests with query parameter "query" or "q".

      Returns usage message if no query parameter is provided.

      Throws:
      IOException

    • handleStore

      private void handleStore(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Storage browser handler.

      Directory listings are returned as HTML (clickable links). Individual .eml files are served as text/plain.

      IOException
